name: Aeroplanoui
description:
You are tasked with protecting the asteroid mining operation, when the enemy starts the invasion. Protect your base from the incoming hostile forces for as long as you can to earn your place in the leaderboards.

Aeroplanoui is an exciting, fast-paced action arcade shooter.
Up to four friends can join forces and play online, to shoot your way to victory through hordes of enemy spaceship, tanks, drones and more.
